website_summaries.verdict: The Reebok Zigwild TR 5.0 was a fantastic running shoe that delivered comfort and style all-around, which was agreed upon by many users. Some customers experienced fit issues, but the overall rating for the shoe was favorable, and many runners have found themselves using the Zigwild TR 5.0 repeatedly.
pros: One wearer likened wearing the Zigwild TR 5.0 to “walking on clouds.”
The shoe was a terrific value for money, several customers agreed
A number of users were happy with the stylish look of the shoe
The shoe could be worn all day without causing discomfort in the foot, according to a satisfied user
Many runners found the Zigwild TR 5.0 to be true-to-size
cons: There was not as much traction from the outsole as expected, according to a user
Some buyers commented that the Zigwild TR 5.0 needed breaking in

customer_reviews.title: Look great original manufacturer quality
customer_reviews.text: A little narrow but as you wear them They soon stretch out to be just Wright. I also have a wide foot. besides that they are perfect original manufacturer quality look great this is the fourth pair of Reebok Z shoes that I bought not disappointed at all first time buying shoes off of Amazon happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Bigworm420

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am exceptionally hard to satisfywhen it comes to shoes. I have been consistently pleased by Reebok. These shoes are great. Very comfortable, with plenty of room for heavier socks should the weather turn.
customer_reviews.author: gary gruber

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have long, narrow feet and I like a good arch. Reebok are the only shoes that fit right. They're nice-looking shoes, durable and of obvious good quality, and they feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Ricker

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Fit perfectly, and true to fit. They don't run small like Nike or big like Adidas. Buy the correct size...no need to size up or down. My son says they are the most comfortable athletic shoes he has ever worn. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: 3rd pair of reebok zig style shoes
customer_reviews.text: As the title explains I have been a wearer of reebok zig style running shoes for awhile. Generally these shoes are well constructed however the eyelets are not reinforced like in previous models (maybe to save weight) but it does make the shoe feel cheaper. The insides and toe are reinforced though but my problem has always been on the outside developing a hole by my little toe. My biggest complaint though is even though I ordered the same size they run slightly larger an issue I could deal with in everyday shoes but for running this is going to be an issue and I might end up donating this pair
customer_reviews.author: JKW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've walked a few miles in these shoes, comfortable out of the box, felt a little tight in the midstep , very light, really nice, comfortable shoe for hiking. One issue I had, the gap in the sole collects various debris when trail walking, small issue, otherwise very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: william s seitz jr

customer_reviews.title: No arch support
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying Reebok Zig Tech running shoes for years now for their quality, durability and ARCH SUPPORT. I have high arches and it's difficult to find shoes with good arch support. My last pair of Men's ZigWild Tr 2's lasted for 3 years. They are just now starting to wear out on the inside. I just purchased this 5.0 version as a replacement. No one is saying that they don't have arch support!! They also do not look like they were constructed with the same attention to quality. Lace eyelets are definitely lower quality. I returned them and am looking for an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: P. Zych

customer_reviews.title: Can’t live without
customer_reviews.text: Shoeaholic here...this style is my all-time favorite. New puppy got ahold of my older pair and I just couldn’t be without them. I have a narrow foot and need arch support...my feet just feel good when I’m wearing these. I do think these are ever-so-slightly larger, but not enough to go down a half size.
customer_reviews.author: C. KC

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Reeboks!
customer_reviews.text: As a Reebok fan since 1987, I am happy to say this shoe does not disappoint! The big seller for me is the Zig Technology design. I wanted something I could run AND hike in separately. On this count, I gladly give it 5 stars. It could use a little more arch support but after walking in them over a mile, this was a not an issue. In general I prefer my Merrell shoes to hike in but these Reeboks are awesome shoes. I NEED to get another pair!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoe I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: This will be my 5th pair of this style of zig-tech shoes, just slightly varied colors. I absolutely LOVE these shoes and wish they were more readily available. They're extremely comfortable, especially out of the box. The sole lasts for a good long time before it wears down, and the shoes are very durable. I work a job that involves a lot of restraining of people when they get out of control so they get stomped on all of the time and yet still hold up great. Lastly, they're very fairly priced. 10/10. I'm going to be really upset when these aren't available anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear for work because I'm on my feet for long periods of time. These shoes have helped quite a bit with the fatigue my feet were feeling with my previous pair of shoes. There's a memory foam insole which is nice and soft on the feet. I replaced the laces with some of the rubber laces you can find on Amazon, and those apply the perfect amount of force on my foot to keep it comfortable and also keep the shoes from slipping.
customer_reviews.author: imcelv

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Past sneaker purchases I have to get used to the fit an whatever bells and whistles, but these have been the exception for me. Shoes are super comfortable an able to take what I dish out over the last few weeks with little wear. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Dorsett

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes, Be Careful if You Are Switching from ASICS brand shoes- Fit is different
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this shoe and it's comfortable, but buyer beware: Not all size 10 1/2's are created equal. I had been wearing ASICS shoes, of which I wear a size 10 1/2, which is a size 44.5 in Europe. The Reebok size 10 1/2 is size 44 in Europe. While this doesn't seem like a big deal, this Reebok shoe is narrower (must be what the .5 difference is) than my old ASICS running shoes and thus feels too small. Otherwise, the shoe looks cool and feels about as comfortable as a shoe that's 1/2 size too small can be expected to feel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoes
customer_reviews.text: The only shoes my husband wears for work. He walks a lot, comparable to running daily and the shoes last awhile and remain comfortable. These were cheaper than the in-store exact pair and we also ordered here because 2 stores said they had them in stock but were, in fact, out of stock.
customer_reviews.author: Cely

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bartend and if you're looking for a shoe that provides comfort for 8+ hours on cement floors then these are great! They're not slip resistant but if your know what your doing then you can move around on wet floors without falling.
customer_reviews.author: Dimartini

customer_reviews.title: Near perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Still one of the most comfortable shoes ever. At 6ft 1in 260lbs, I tend to go through shoes pretty fast. Only drawback is they're starting to fall apart after a couple weeks! Just the soles though, shop im going to pick up some shoo goo cause im not sending them back!!
customer_reviews.author: IdahoPhil63

customer_reviews.title: The Best Running Shoes I have ever had.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these back in April. Run one hour a day in them. And still am loving them. Good fit and traction on the trails. The are more comfortable than the day I bought them but otherwise show very little ware.
customer_reviews.author: J.Pawlak

customer_reviews.title: Saving my lower back
customer_reviews.text: This are great shoes if you are on your feet all day on concrete. My lower back use to hurt from stand all day but after getting these shoes and super feet insoles it has minimized my lower back pain. The shoes hold up ok. If you have the shoe to loose the inside of the shoe wears out and gets holes in the fabric. I keep buying them because they help me out
customer_reviews.author: Eric S. Siraton

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a runner but I walk 4-5 miles a day as part of my employment. These are very comfortable aalking shoes. They're not so good if you're just standing though. I'll be replacing these with a identical pair when it's time.
customer_reviews.author: J. Locke

customer_reviews.title: 12 hour day, all day wear no fatigue. Great for flat feet!
customer_reviews.text: I use these shoes for work, I work 7-7 12 hours a day a lot of walking I’m a service advisor at a dealership. I use them after seeing a nurse wearing them I asked if they were good she said yes highly recommended them. So now was this was my 12th pair. Reebok zig techs highly recommended for all day use. Absorbs a lot of heel impact especially if you’re flat footed like me.
customer_reviews.author: Geronimo L Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these shoes. I got these for gym workouts for more support on my ankles and these shoes are great! Awesome traction and extremely comfortable. I ordered the conversion size for women’s as I didn’t like the colors offered in the woman’s style of this shoe. The fit is perfect and will definitely buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Christa M.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. If you are on your feet alot these are perfect. Also they last a while. I have a pair that is 2 years old and I just bought a new pair but the old ones are still in good shape. They fit a half size to big. I usually wear men's 11 but these 11s are a little big. Other than that amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Eagle

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe Reebok ever made!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes. Last long! Only bad thing is the recessed are in the heel will pick up stones/rocks. I wish they wouldn’t have stopped making them.
customer_reviews.author: K. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Not very durable as models in the past, mine are starting to peel away at the front and I only bought them in May, however they fit perfectly and are extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort Combined with Staying Power
customer_reviews.text: The shoes have stood up to walking every day. They fit nicely and really support my body on impact when running. I recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Lookingforfreedom

customer_reviews.title: That I can walk normally and without pain.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that I have finally found a sneaker that allows me to walk without being in pain due to having a cyst on the bottom of my foot. I bought a pair Nike Vapor Max’s from the mall and they lasted all of 2-3 months before the loop that you put the shoe laces through snapped on me. So decided to go with Reebok as I have seen a few of my co-workers wear this style of sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: Logan H.

customer_reviews.title: Groovy shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great style, look, and price! A bit tight for my huge wide foot but I am happy over all and use them in the gym and for walking or standing in general use.
customer_reviews.author: Three D

customer_reviews.title: Wrong sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these sneakers and I wanted women’s size 7.5 which is what the items says it is. Mens size 7.5 was delivered. Returned the item and got a replacement. Wrote that 7.5 mens came and didn’t order that. Today the replacement came and it was a mens 7.5 again!! Something must be wrong with the product description!
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Not as cushiony
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable as previous versions of this shoe, soles are a harder plastic material and are not as cushiony as previous versions of this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Craig

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable straight out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I dislike is that if you walk on gravel/small rocks they tend to get stuck in between the Z's. Otherwise, it's an extremely comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Scarmona

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Wish they would still make them because this design and the comfort is great. They fit to size so even better.
customer_reviews.author: pparker1

customer_reviews.title: Comfort fit for walking with flat feet
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this style of shoe for a couple of years and I can use them without arch supports with my very flat feet and they provide great support and comfort
customer_reviews.author: BobH

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. My husband liked them so much I ordered him a second pair to keep for later. My husband is very picky when it comes to shoes so these are definitely an A+. They are high quality and fit him perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Widmom

customer_reviews.title: Big guys need wider fits
customer_reviews.text: Big guys need wider fits my husband told me it has good absorption but the insoles are narrow & can be annoying working & standing all day the insoles being narrow makes him kinda tired. But he willing to give the Zigzag brand another go but go for wider fits even though his feet don't look that wide he's well porportioned but is a big man 6'3 310 The absorption is really good worth another try
customer_reviews.author: Trudy Tyson

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable shoe I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Reebok's Zigwild is the most comfortable shoe I've owned in years. I'm on my feet for hours everyday and when I wear these I don't worry about my feet aching when I get home.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe. I own several pair and wear them daily. I especially love them for travelling. Light weight but great support.
customer_reviews.author: T. Taggart

customer_reviews.title: Product description is incorrect
customer_reviews.text: This product description is incorrect. Per the inside tongue of the shoe, this is a MENS size 8 1/2 shoe, not a woman's size 8 1/2. A men's 8 1/2 is too large for me, so I had to return the product.
customer_reviews.author: Michele in Lakewood

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I only run around 10 miles a week due to a bad back. These really help with the impact on my lower back. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Toast

customer_reviews.title: My second pair!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have to say much. I am on my second pair and I still wear my first pair when I don't want my new ones to get dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comes a port very essy
customer_reviews.text: In the first two weeks the rubier in front start to pill off . The fabric is getting very quickly dirty with every sprinkle it leaves spots on it
customer_reviews.author: Eugenia Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Running Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Really like the snug fit and lightweight feel of the shoes. Rocks do not get stuck on the bottom unlike my previous style. Looking forward to working out in these for hundreds of miles.
customer_reviews.author: TopShelfBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. Use them for walking per added arch support. Wore the last pair out after 9 month, or about 850 miles (give or take)...
customer_reviews.author: HD1

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. Not good for outdoor running since rocks and debris will def get stuck in the “zigs” but for indoor these are great!
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Comfort for big feet
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. So comfortable I wish Reebok still made them. This is my 4th pair my favorite shoes ever
customer_reviews.author: TNT

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfect and they are very light weight more than I could’ve asked for And when I went to re-order a second pair the day that I got them the price doubled so I know I got a heckuva deal
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Azzopardi.

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING
customer_reviews.text: Best shoe ever sold.. I have owned over 10 pair and not has any back pain since the first set purchased
customer_reviews.author: gary jakober

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable and rugged pair of trail shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, comfortable and durable! I have used them to run everywhere on every surface and they hold up well! The construction and quality of materials used is superior to many shoes that I have paid more for. Excellent, quality pair of shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Art T.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these! I’ve ordered 6 pair in the last 4 years. Please don’t stop making them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrific shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable and give my foot needed support. I am a basketball referee and do several games in a row, comfort and support are very important.
customer_reviews.author: A. Braun

customer_reviews.title: Good running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Not bad but a bit stiff just needed to get broken in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One if the best shoes I have ever worked in.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. I bought these shoes for work. I have a 10hr day and they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Gjoyce

customer_reviews.title: Just WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I do not recall EVER stepping into a more comfortable shoe! I've only had them for a week, so I can't really speak to the longevity of this shoe, but they definitely seem very well constructed and OH SO COMFORTABLE! Based on the way they look and feel, I would DEFINITELY buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: George H Iveson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe
customer_reviews.text: I will be buying a second pair soon....same color etc.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Higdon

customer_reviews.title: Women can wear these men’s shoes, just go down 2 sizes.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a female runner, and didn’t find my size 11 in these shoes for women, so I ordered a men’s size 9, and they fit perfectly. I am very happy I got these! They give me the support I needed, the comfort, and boosted my daily walking/running goals! ZigWild Reebok shoes are fantastic!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Reebok's are the best shoes for my husband's back pain. Good price. Fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Heather Crawford

customer_reviews.title: 4th pair of Zag, love the fit
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing shoes, great to wear when I'm on my feet standing for 8+hrs or going for daily exercise (I go on long fast paced walks, not jogging. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lejeune

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Really like these shoes, I bought them to work out in and they were so comfortable I started using them for work, I'm on my feet all day and they feel great, now I need to get another pair to work out in. Only draw back is that if you walk on gravel they can get rocks stuck in the sole.
customer_reviews.author: Mutt

customer_reviews.title: Reebok Men's Zigwild Shoes
customer_reviews.text: A very attractive shoe that fits extremely well and is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, I love Reebok's.... These shoes are perfect! Comfortable, great for walking and running.
customer_reviews.author: ronald scott

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth pair and still the best running shoes for me
customer_reviews.author: jose siliezar

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for... More comfort in a running shoe... Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Bagnana

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved these shoes. 3rd pair my favorite shoes. All the new shoes are ugly.
customer_reviews.author: davsol82666

customer_reviews.title: Great fit! Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Beyond the super cool design, is a comfortable fit, ultra light weight, durable sneaker, perfect for running, working out or out on a casual hangout. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mhari F

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not material is bad
customer_reviews.text: The shoes feel amazing and the support is great. Its comfortable to work all day in and amazing for running and working out but within a couple of months it started tearing off from places. So the cloth material is very bad
customer_reviews.author: Shalini Guha

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: GREAT shoes guve to my uncle as gift and he loved them
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Good pair, would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes ever bought, the color is not as shown, but close enough.
customer_reviews.author: Dru

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these about 2 months ago and been very happy with them. I stand for long periods of time with my job and they have been very comfortable. I have had surgery on my Achilles, and finding a comfortable shoe has been hard. I have no problems with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe to purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very nice authentic shoe comfortable nice colors but they didn’t help me out run the cops :(
customer_reviews.author: Tyler wells

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: One of the best fitting and comfortable shoes i have ever put on!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Simmons

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed son has not even wore these shoes that much and the front plastic rubber that comes up on the tip of the shoe in front of the toes is coming unglued looks horrible for the price you pay surely the shoe should hold up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, the only shoes I like to run in
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes. These shoes fits a little tighter compared to other brands but I'm been using Reebok forever so if you're new then buy half size larger.
customer_reviews.author: peter559

customer_reviews.title: Good for like 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: They are not really comfortable, if you are standing or walking for 6 to 7 hours a day this shoes will start killing your feet after like 2weeks
customer_reviews.author: Peter R

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Had an old pair of Zigs that are worn out. Replace them with these.
customer_reviews.author: Road Glide

customer_reviews.title: To small
customer_reviews.text: Good looking shoes but too small in toe box. Felt like half size to small
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Amazon fulfillment is bad
customer_reviews.text: Review is for Amazon fulfillment. Shipped men's size instead of women's. The line for returns at Kohl's has ten people deep, so apparently sucking is a pretty common occurrence.
customer_reviews.author: Kiera Arbour

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The soles of these shoes are not secured with quality materials. They fall apart with very minimal wear. It’s very unfortunate because I find this design to be very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: So far so good I'm into my third day , wearing at work today see how they handle. I like the fit it is a very nice fit nothing loose nothing too tight comfort I'm giving it 4.5 out of 5
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL GREAVES

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, great running shoe, high quality and fits well except it's a bit narrower than my old ZIG TECH. But overall I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KUSHHA

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: One of the most comfortable pairs of shoes i've ever had!
customer_reviews.author: Rex

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect i ref basketball and wouldn't use anything else but these
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Very stable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a walking/running shoe with a wide base for stability. This shoe fits the bill very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rubber Toe Piece Peeling Away
customer_reviews.text: Less than one month of wear and the rubber toe piece is peeling away from the shoe fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie T

customer_reviews.title: Fabtastic workout shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Light and looks good too. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: mzaham b.

customer_reviews.title: Was sent a Men's Size 10 instead of Women's. This a Male shoe but is listed as Women's.
customer_reviews.text: This is listed as a woman's shoe but it is a Men's shoe and the sizing is completely different. I was afraid to even re-order and get another men's shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoes (athletic or otherwise) that I have ever worn. Highly recommend shoes and seller (received them a week before expected).
customer_reviews.author: Dimos Spyropoulos

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: The only shoes that are comfortable to workout/run in. My second pair. About to buy a third.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Very relaxed and fitted shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and relaxed shoes I recommended any one wanna buy a shoes just get this ... I will buy a new one soon 👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: What a great a comfortable shoe i can definetly be on my feet all day with no pain and alot of support as well
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Insoles Not Removable
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't remove the insole to replace with better ones. No more "Boks" for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast/clean/perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Impressive sneaker and more impressive service, looking forward to buying another pair
customer_reviews.author: Naamz

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and provided to support I needed to officiate basketball games
customer_reviews.author: Rick Black

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I like reebok, comfy, cool and a heck of a lot cheaper than Nike.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas peluso

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It says womens but the item received was mens. Very irritating and disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Decker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable love these shoes my 3rd pair absolutely live these shoes
customer_reviews.author: logan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, durable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, use for work, better than any Nike product.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES CURRLIN

customer_reviews.title: Great trail running shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are my third pair of Reebok’s best fitting running shoe I have had.
customer_reviews.author: Cyril leboeuf

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this shoe for 5 years almost daily. The most comfortable shoe I have ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: WALLACE

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and the fit of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: SoulMagic25

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality as Expected
customer_reviews.text: The Zigtech never failed me. It was as comfortable as before. This is my second pair Zigtech.
customer_reviews.author: Max

product_meta.title: Reebok Women's ZigWild Tr 5.0 Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Reebok was founded for one of the best reasons possible: athletes wanted to run faster. So in the 1890s, joseph william Foster made some of the first known running shoes with spikes in them. By 1895, he was in business making shoes by hand for top runners; and before long his fledgling company, j.W. Foster and sons, developed an international clientele of distinguished athletes.
